Attr.desc: Specifies the URL where the form data should be sent.
Specifies the HTTP method to use for form submission. Options include:

options.title: GET
options.desc: Appends form data to the URL as query parameters.

options.title: POST
options.desc: Sends form data in the body of the request (more secure for sensitive data).

Attr.desc: Specifies how the form data should be encoded when submitting it to the server. Common values include:

options.title: text/plain
options.desc: Submits form data as plain text.

formValidation.title: Required Field
formValidation.desc: Ensures that the field must be filled out before submitting the form.

formValidation.title: Pattern Matching
formValidation.desc: Specifies a regular expression for validating input.

formValidation.title: Min/Max Length
formValidation.desc: Set the minimum and maximum length of text input fields.

attrs.title: type="email"

attrs.title: type="url"
